description:
There are millions of items auctioned at eBay. Even if only a small percentage of them are misspelled, there are thousands of misspelled auction titles. These auctions will attract less or no bidders because they will not be found using the usual eBay search. As they attract less bidders, the selling price is lower.

Typoz generates a list of typos for the name of the objects you're looking for and search eBay with it.

You'll have access to those hard to find auctions and be able to get your desired object for a bargain price.

You can also enter a list of words that should not appear in the search results to narrow the selection.

Typoz allows you to search not only on ebay.com but also on one of 19 other eBay country sites including :eBay Australia, eBay Austria, eBay Belgium in Dutch, eBay Belgium in French, eBay Canada, eBay France, eBay Germany, eBay India, eBay Ireland, eBay Italy, eBay Malaysia, eBay Netherlands, eBay Philippines, eBay Poland, eBay Singapore, eBay Spain, eBay Sweden, eBay Switzerland, eBay United Kingdom.

To facilitate the browsing, Typoz launches the mobile eBay sites for the countries where it is available.

Use typoz and get direct access to those hidden auctions.
